DOC.brief_summary: The aim retrospective study find one follow parameter impact postcesarean section pain : age , ethnic origin , parity , body habitus , smoking , breastfeeding , education , newborn intensive care unit , primary/repeated operation , elective/emergency operation , junior/senior surgeon , type anesthesia operation .
DOC.brief_title: Postcesarean Section Pain : Possible Demographic Medical Predictors
DOC.detailed_description: The medical record 600 consecutive woman cesarean section reviewed.We analyse correlation postcesarean section pain level , analgesic consumption ; age , ethnic origin , parity , body habitus , smoking , breastfeeding , education , newborn intensive care unit , primary/repeated operation , elective/emergency operation , junior/senior surgeon , type anesthesia operation .
DOC.criteria: Women undergo cesarean section Medical psychological condition enable reliable patient pain assessment
